"Hm-hm-hm, we've got a new customer~" the watcher said. She pressed a button, which locked the door behind you. You didn't notice though, you had a casino to explore. The lobby just had a bunch of human ladies hanging out in it, but the lobby bore black marble flooring with golden patterns engraved into it. The walls appeared amber yellow, and bore the card-suit symbols on the sides, featured symmetrically so that the four emblems faced each other on each opposing wall. The lobby looked lovely.

You saw three signs pointing left, one labeled Betting Tables, one labeled Performance Hall, and one labeled bar. One sing pointed right, labeled Hotel. These seemed like good places to check out. Where do you go?

"What the fuck are you planning to do to me?" You ask, getting more and more terrified.

"You know those real fancy restaurants sometimes let you eat your food off the body of a supermodel? I want to see if we could do something similar here. Serve the food on a human, then let the guests take their 'plate' with them for some after dinner fun." The hippo said as he began to prepare the first dish. "So all you gotta do is hold real still so you don't make a mess."

You've heard of what he described, but you never expected him to use you in such a way. Still, after having him sit on you, this was hardly the worst that could happen. It was no doubt the strangest thing you'd ever done in your life, but at least it wouldn't hurt. You looked at the hippo as he gently deposited colorful pieces of food on your belly and chest. He shuffled them around a little until he had a composition he approved of.

"Hold out your hand." He said, putting a trail of exotic sushi pieces along your arm and onto your hand. If you moved your arm they'd all fall off. With nerves beginning to kick in you ask the hippo how long you were going to have to stay like this.

"Just another minute. Oh, you look positively scrumptious, human. I think this is going to be a big hit. Now hold still for the money shot." He grabbed a camera and took lots of pictures from every angle. You felt your arm beginning to jitter and beg the pudgy beast to hurry it up. He sets down the camera and supports your arm with a chubby finger. "Close your eyes, human." You fearfully obey, dreading to think what he was about to do. Your fears deepened when you felt his warm breath wash over your arm. Suddenly his lips met around your elbow and your entire lower arm was engulfed in the wet cavern of Giovanni's mouth. A thick tongue swept the sushi from your arm, letting you finally move it more freely. You open your eyes to look directly into the hippo's almost amorous stare.

A big gulp sent the sushi down his throat before he advanced further, suckling on your arm and slurping more of it inside. Like a twisted game of Pacman he gobbled up the trail of sushi pieces along your arm. Once his rubbery lips touched your shoulder he withdrew, leaving your entire arm coated in slimy saliva. You shuddered as calmly as possible as to not disturb the meal laid out on your torso. Giovanni appreciated your restraint and quickly began to help you out. He opened wide and brought his maw down towards your belly. For a moment you were horrified that he was going to take a big bite out of you, but he was incredibly gentle. You felt his big lips drag along your gut as he scooped together all the food present and slurped it all up into that cavernous maw. The hippo's huge mouth only needed two more slurps before he'd completely cleaned out your torso, leaving only smears of drool behind. You wanted to get up, thinking your job was done, but the hippo held you down on the plate.

"Not quite yet, my tasty little human. I haven't served dessert yet." You were anxious to see what strange food he was going to stack on you and where. You shudder as he came near with a scoop full of icecream and planted it right on your forehead. He drizzled warm chocolate over it and garnished it with some fruit. You shiver a little, desperate not to let the food stacked on your forehead slide down as Giovanni dips down with puckered lips. He slurps the dessert up into his maw and plants a wet kiss on your forehead, suckling on the chocolate and garnish until not a trace of them remained on you.

"And now, the grand finale." He said proudly, You looked down with confusion and fear as he carefully placed a small round pudding on top of the spandex bulge. It was strangely warm and giovanni quickly topped it with a fragrant fruity sauce. The hippo could barely keep himself back and the moment he'd emptied his hands he pressed his mouth onto your crotch. The pudding went up into his maw, but his tongue lingered, lapping up and down the 'plate'. You're certain he already licked you clean long before he finally concluded and sat back.

"How's that for an exclusive experience?" The hippo thought aloud, a smug grin on his face. "You did admirably well, human. Thanks for trusting me, but now it's time."

"Time for what?" You ask fearfully
12412222112211231.title: You take a shower, curious about Giovanni's plans

choices: The hungry hippo digests you
Giovanni spits you back out after a while
You slowly travel through the hippo and emerge from the backdoor
124122221122112311.content:
"Those little appetizers I made were all immensely tasty, but it's time for the main course." Giovanni said with a slow, smooth voice.

"You're still hungry after all that?" You respond incredulously. You thought he'd helped himself to an entire banquet.

"Come now, little man. Do you think those delicious little bites would be enough for this big belly?" He patted his rotund gut. The hippo looked at you with a mix of intense desire and hunger. Every single hair on your exposed body stood on end, but you were frozen in fear.

"You added a brilliant subtle flavour to so many of the dishes, but I'm hungry for a bigger sample." He mused, licking his chops and leaning in.

You finally snapped out of your panic and tried to bolt off the large serving platter. But as you scrambled away a large leathery hand gripped your ankle tightly. Giovanni pulled you back, his size and strength easily overwhelming you. The hippo chef lifted you up into the air, dangling you in front of him and looking you in the eye.

"Don't be so fussy. At least you'll end up in the belly of someone who truly appreciates your refined... taste. Don't think any of the guests would've treated you differently." He said with a little huff. Was this fat hippo really personally insulted that you didn't just let him devour you? I didn't matter either way, as Giovanni opened his maw wide, bringing you closer. His warm breath smelled like the fancy dishes he'd served before. The hippo's fearsome jaws slowly closed around your head, his thick lips suckling around your neck. You tried to squirm and struggle, but he simply squeezed your ankle with enough force you feared he'd break it, the pain coercing you to just let him do what he wanted. Was this really happening?

Giovanni's tongue slathered your head in drool before the hippo finally decided to stop playing with his food. Slowly his lips slurped up more of your body. Your view was aimed squarely at the back of his throat. Right on cue he opened it up, sending your head down his neck with a loud gulp. Several more followed, each helping to push you down his gullet. Even at his size, this was a substantial morsel to devour, but the hippo wasn't so easily deterred. He closed his eyes and let go of your ankle. It was far too late to resist his efforts now and with a final enormous gulp he sends you plummeting into his stomach.

The fleshy chamber was large and empty save for a puddle of thick slop. It smelled like the fancy appetizers he had you 'serve' before. Was this his plan all along? Use you as a serving tray and a meal in one? You wondered if that was the reason so many of the large animal patrons you saw around here were fat. Did they all eat people or were you a rare delicacy? You pound against the slimy walls, but Giovanni doesn't seem to even notice your resistance. Suddenly your prison is shaken around.

"Settle down in there. I've got a job to do. If you keep still and don't disturb me I might let you out before you get digested." His baritone voice rumbled. You were shocked to hear him talk so callously about ending your life. Was this all just another twisted game played in Bunnie's Casino? You struggle to think straight, trapped within the humid, smelly cavern of Giovanni's belly.
124122221122112311.title: "Time for the main course!"

1241222211221123111.content:
You weren't about to go out like this. With all your might you punch and kick against the thick, fleshy walls of Giovanni's stomach. The dense mass seems to easily absorb every blow, the damp chamber barely reacting to your violent escape attempts. The hippo did notice though, grabbing his round belly with both hands and shaking it.

"I said, settle down you annoying little-" He grumbled, cutting himself off before he would get too crass. He might just be talking to his meal, but he was a professional. More than could be said for the little twerp in his gut.

You struggled to retain your composure as you were thrown around the cramped stomach. The smell of his fancy appetizers began to fade, replaced by the stench of digesting food. The pool of thick slop had grown a little larger. It became very difficult to keep yourself out of it. Whenever you dipped your toes in you could feel them tingle for a second before going numb. Was that normal? You didn't exactly have anything to compare this freakshow to.

Giovanni had packed his things up and was on his way back to the kitchen. He greeted the guests in the restaurant and got to work cooking all manner of spectacular meals for them. He still felt a little sorry for the patrons though. None of them would eat anything near as delicious as he had. He hummed with delight, pleased to feel your resistance fading.

You were on your last leg. The sticky goop had already knocked out the other and one of your hands had gone numb too. Moreover, after half an hour of punching and kicking you were simply exhausted. It took more and more effort just to keep your eyes open. Was the numbing starting to get to your head? Was the supply of air in the hippo's stomach running out? You tried to wrap your head around it, but you weren't able to figure out a solution before you drifted into unconsciousness. The last thing you felt was a big, warm splash as you flopped into the pool of stomach juices. The hippo never even noticed you passing out. He was hard at work when Bunnie walked in to the kitchen. Giovanni wiped the sweat of his brow and shot her a knowing smile.

"Has the intruder been dealt with?" She asks, her voice dripping with malice.

"Right here. Pity he won't be coming back. He's a real treat, would've done great with the guests." The hippo chuckles and pats his belly.

"Good. As amusing as it was to watch him flounder about in here, we can't have unregistered humans scurrying all over the place. I'll see to it that you're rewarded for your services."

The hippo laughs and quickly throws up his hands. "That won't be necessary. The extra meal he got me is reward enough."

Bunnie pats his shoulder and smiles. She left Giovanni to get back to work. Hours ticked by as the hippo's busy belly eagerly transformed you into more pudgy blubber. Today had been a good day for the hippo and when he went to bed that night he gave his jiggling gut a gentle stroke. "Good night, human, you were fun while it lasted."
1241222211221123111.title: The hungry hippo digests you

choices: In his stomach
Up his butt
12412222112212.content:
You hear the hippo behind you gaining. First you could hear his stomping by the corridor, no big deal, he’s still plenty far. But in mere seconds you could hear him gaining. You start to have a mini-panic-attack mid-run. This can’t happen! He can’t win! If he does you may never go home again. Tears streak down your cheeks as you huff and puff, muttering to yourself, “No, please, don’t win. I wanna win, I wanna go home!” Thankfully, you get your wish. You make it to the elevator… although you’re too caught up in running that you don’t slow down in time. SLAM! You ram yourself face-first into the elevator door and collapse on the ground, “Ouch.”

As you clutch your face you could hear Giovanni chuckling as he approaches you, “Good one. Can’t lie, I wasn’t expecting you to beat me. But I’m a man of my word, so I guess it’s time to get you outta here.” Despite the pain you get up off the floor and smile at the hippo looming over you, “T-thanks. I really need to get home.” The hippo grins deviously, “No problem.” You then feel Giovanni’s big, meaty paws grab your sides. You yelp in fear as he brings you up to his grinning snout, “Now, where to put ya’?” You shiver in fear, “P-put me where?” Giovanni shrugs, “Well I can’t just walk out with ya’. Gotta be more covert, I need to hide ya’.” Then the hippo’s eyes widen, “I got the perfect place!” Where does Giovanni hide you?
12412222112212.title: You manage to outrun Giovanni

choices: Freedom! You escaped Bunnie's Casino
It's a trap! Giovanni has taken you to Bunnie
Giovanni has taken you somewhere else
124122221122121.content:
The hippo brings you closer and gives your head a big lick. A shiver of fear runs down your spine. Was he... tasting you? Giovanni smirks before explaining himself.

"A scrawny little thing like you wouldn't even be noticeable inside this big belly. There's only two ways in and you don't want to go through the back door, trust me."

A look of revulsion came across your face. Did he really consider cramming you up his ass? You'd been through all that with that horrible elephant woman from earlier, and you were in no rush to ever do that again. It looks like there's no other way than to have him swallow you whole.

"Don't worry, I've done this many times, you'll be safe." He assured you as he lifted you over his head. It did little to stop you from shivering as the hippo parted his large jaws and lowered you down. His breath was warm and offputting, his tongue dragging along your legs, guiding then to the depths of his gullet. Even with his greater size he needed to work to get you into his belly. You felt the powerful muscles in his throat close around your legs as he pulled them in. In a single gulp he'd taken care of them. It was surreal to feel yourself sink into his throat, but Giovanni almost seemed to enjoy it. His tongue slathered you with thick layers of viscous drool, a soft murr rumbling around you. He liked what he was tasting. You tried to keep it together as best you could, but when the next gulp claimed most of your torso you panicked.

"Stop! I changed my mind! I don't want to~"

GULP

Your pleas were cut short when your head was plunged into the wet tunnel of his esophagus. It squeezed and undulated all around you, dragging you further away from safety and into the dark depths of Giovanni's body. After a few seconds you could feel the passage end and you were unceremoniously dumped into his stomach. It was hot, slimy and completely dark. The hippo's belly rumbled and groaned, pleased with its meal. You tried to steady yourself, but the constant movement of the walls around you made it difficult. A small pool of fluids rested at the bottom of the stomach and you were resigned to sit in them. You didn't expect to stay try with a trip like this, but feeling yourself get soaked was gross all the same. When you got back home you were going to sit in the shower for three hours straight to wash this crap off.

Several dull thumps echo through your nasty prison as the hippo contently pats his belly. "Hah, like I said, not a difference." He mused to himself. "Can you hear me? Tap once for yes, twice for no." Giovanni felt two bumps from inside his stomach, a big smile curling up on his face.

"Good, now just relax and enjoy the ride as I get you out of here." The hippo said as he called the elevator. While waiting he kept talking to you.

"Did you know you taste delicious? You should really consider volunteering here. Lots of people would pay top dollar to have you for a meal and Bunnie would make sure you stay alive to enjoy that massive payday."

When you try to reply your whole world shifts and shakes. The elevator had arrived and Giovanni walked in, selecting the ground floor. His belly jiggled with every step, throwing you around inside of it. You began to fear that the hippo wouldn't be so willing to help you any more. If you were as valuable as he suggested, what was going to stop him from handing you over to this Bunnie? And if he was serious about you being delicious, would he ever let you out of his belly to begin with? You were completely at his mercy and you only had the hippo's word that he was going to spit you back out again. But after that horrid elephant and being shoved up her ass you didn't feel like you had any other choice. You could only pray that Giovanni was a hippo of his word as much as he claimed to be. His stomach shook again as the elevator reached its destination.

The hippo felt his little human meal sloshing around inside of him. He gave the receptionist a polite nod and walked out the front door. Nobody was the wiser to his little stowaway. In the pitch darkness of his belly you were slowly getting more disoriented. You couldn't tell if it had been minutes or hours you'd spent in here. From the first moment in the wet, smelly chamber it felt like an eternity already.

Suddenly the walls contract, squeezing you painfully. You try to cry out, but you can feel something near your head opening up. Giovanni was getting you out. You were relieved to know he honored his bargain, but terrified at the same time. His innards felt strong enough to crush you to death and you had no idea if you were moving in this wild rollercoaster. Your answer came soon enough as you saw the first sparks of light at the end of the tunnel. In mere seconds he'd launched you from his gullet and into his arms, setting you down carefully. Your legs were still a little shaky, but with a helping hand you regained your footing.
124122221122121.title: In his stomach

1241222211221211.content:
You wipe the goop from your face and get a first glimpse of your surroundings. This street... you recognize it! This was the way to the casino. The big hippo kept his word and actually got you back home. You grin, thinking about how silly that phrase sounded. Until a few days ago you wouldn't have conceived of anything like the adventure you'd been on. You still weren't sure if this wasn't all some seriously messed up drug trip. You take a few cautious steps, your legs still wobbly from the time spent inside Giovanni's belly. You look back and see the hippo looking concerned.

"Thank you..." You stammer out awkwardly.

"Don't mention it. Bunnie Casino can be a dangerous place for people who aren't ready for what happens in there. I hope being in my belly wasn't too scary for you." He mutters back, smiling kindly.

"It was definitely something." You scratch the back of your head. Probably best not to mention the elephant lady that stuck you up her butt, he might just get ideas.

"You did great. Are you sure I can't convince you to try volunteering? You basically get to enjoy the casino without having to worry about your health. If anything happens you'll just regenerate in a new body. And the payday is apparently really good by human standards." The hippo seems a little uneasy as he makes his sales pitch. Regardless, your mind is set.

"Thanks, but I'll pass. Things are a little too intense for my tastes in there, regeneration or not." You reply with a laugh.

Giovanni chuckles awkwardly before fishing a small card from his outfit. "Here. If you ever change your mind, call this and tell them Giovanni recommends you. Bunnie might even up the payment a little when she hears that, and she'll probably be willing to ignore your little sneaking in adventure too." Before he gives it to you the hippo scribbles something on the back of the card. "And if you'd rather just call me, that's my number. I'd love to help you get eased into things. We can always use more volunteers and you're a natural."

You take the business card and smile. His offer was kind but you can't imagine there to be any reward high enough to deal with large animal people sticking you inside of them. You reach up and pat the hippo's large thigh. "Thanks, and goodbye." You were about to turn and walk away when you feel a large finger tap on your shoulder. The hippo looks at you, blushing bright red.

"Could I... Could I have one last taste before you leave? Just a little one?" He asks bashfully.

You roll your eyes. You were so close to the end of your adventure. Best to keep the big guy happy before he decides to be less nice about having a taste. One time in his belly was enough for a lifetime. You give him a nod and the hippo carefully leans down, taking hold of your head and sticking out his tongue. The slobbery muscle drags along your cheek, leaving behind a slimy trail whilst the hippo lets out a delighted hum. True to his word, he lets you go stands back. "Goodbye little human. I hope we meet again. I'd love to get to know you more." You weren't sure, but it almost seemed like a tear was welling up in his eye. You two only met less than an hour ago and most of your time together was spent with you inside his big belly. You give the big oaf a smile and a wave as you walk down the street.

There was no way you'd ever forget this strange adventure. Perhaps when you're older you could consider going back to see what this volunteering shtick was all about. Or maybe just give that awkward hippo man a call and see where that goes. For now you're just happy to have survived Bunnie Casino.
1241222211221211.title: Freedom! You escaped Bunnie's Casino

1241222212.content:
It was a grueling and hellish few hours you spent inside the elephant butt. There wasn’t much you could do except slightly squirm, cry for help, suck in her nasty farts and try desperately to reach for your cellphone to call your parents, but the constricting intestinal walls made that impossible. After what felt like an eternity the elephant started to move, unbeknownst to you her shift was over and she was headed to her room.

With a sigh the elephant entered her room and shut the door, locking it. She pulled off her work clothes and then pulled down her pants. Squatting and concentrating the elephant let out a huge, bassy fart that shot you painfully out onto the floor. You groaned as the elephant loomed over you a smirked evilly, your eyes adjusting to the light. The curvy anthro woman cooed, “Now, what to do with you next?”

12412222121.content:
"Let's get to know eachother a little better. I've got the perfect game to break the ice." The elephant confidently leaned in and picked you up with her trunk. She seemed completely indifferent to the foul gunk her intestines left behind as you were farted back out. You were taken into the bathroom and dropped in a sink the size of a bathtub for you. You shrieked in surprise as the tap unleashed a torrent of icy cold water over you. With a sponge and a bit of rough handling the elephant washed away any trace of her butt on you. The only thing she didn't fully get rid of was the smell. Though not as strong, you still carried a distinct scent of elephant farts. She grabbed a towel and dried off the shivering man before carrying him back to her room.

Between the icy cold water and the anthro elephant's rough washing of you the chances of your phone surviving were slim. Worse yet, it didn't seem like the hulking grey beast was done with you yet. She sat herself down on her bed, parting her legs wide. Though you tried your hardest not to look, your eyes wandered down to catch a glimpse of her womanhood. She began to lower you down towards it. Did she see you sneak a peek or was this all part of her plan? You look up to see a reassuring smile as she sets you down on her bed.

"Now you stay right there, little guy. If you try to escape I'll have to punish you again." The elephant slaps her rear to further drive home that her ass is more than happy to accommodate you. You weren't keen on spending another second squashed between those cheeks or sucked up into her fetid hole. You'd experienced enough of that to last several lifetimes already.

"The game is really simple. I ask you questions and you answer them. To make things interesting I'm also going to slowly bring my legs together. So if you're too slow, you will be pulverized by my big, sexy thighs." You gulp loudly. Each of those huge thighs was as wide as you were tall. She could probably crush cars with them, what chance would you stand?

"Answer right, and I'll leave you here in my room to rest for a few hours. But if I don't like the things I hear, you're going to discover just how much this elephant loves to play rough with naughty little humans that sneak into places they're not supposed to be. But I'm sure you're a lot smarter than the average intruder, so let's begin, shall we?" You nod meekly, unsure where this will go. But even a chance at a few hours outside the elephant's clutches seems like heaven right now.

"First question, how the hell did you end up in my clothes?"
12412222121.title: She plays a game with you to break the ice

choices: Tell her the truth, you’re a sneak-in
Lie to her, you came here with your parents
124122221211.content:
You shook in fear, wondering if you should lie to the elephant woman or tell the truth. As you mull it over in your head you remember your parents always told you to tell the truth, “W-well, I was watching Bunnie perform in the performance hall, but I felt kind of weird, almost scared of her. I didn’t like how I was feeling but I wasn’t sure how to leave, and I didn’t want to be rude and storm out of the hall doors that looked like they were shut for the performance. I panicked and ran into the dressing area, thinking I could find a way out but instead I got tangled in your clothes.”

You looked up at the grinning elephant, hoping she liked your answer. It was the truth after all. Her devious smile grew as she cooed, “Aw, you’re so precious. I bet you were really scared, huh?” You nodded meekly. She elephant woman seemed to like your answer so far. She bent over a bit and teasingly pinched your cheek, “Now, one last question before I leave you be… why exactly are you here in the first place? You’re clearly too young to be here on your own.” Now you were internally panicking. Should you tell her the truth that you’re a sneak in or come up with a white lie?

You wish you never snuck in. Whimpering you yell out to the elephant woman, “How long are you gonna keep me in here?” You nearly burst into tears as you wait for the anthro’s reply. You can hear her ‘hmm’ and moan as she contemplates your question. In an upbeat, cheery tone she replies, “That’s a good question kiddo. Hmm, how about…”

"A FEW DAYS?!?" You shout in shock. You try to protest against this and attempt to push hard against the slick walls.
"You heard me little boy, your staying in my ass for three days, now quit whining and deal with it!" Before she let's out a moist fart over you before going back to her job. Your mind starts to reel, there was no way you could manage to stay in this massive woman's ass, especially considering that the only thing you would be breathing in is her thick, fart fumes...

You need to come up with something or somehow try to last out those three days...
12412222132.title: A few days

choices: Head to the Casino Food Court, you’re famished
Head to the Bathrooms to relieve yourself
124122221321.content:
You soon realized your only true way you could escape is by playing by the elephant’s rules. It wouldn’t be easy but you doubted you’d be able to muscle your way through a muscular ring of flesh that’s bigger than you. You settle down and pray the elephant is good on her word. The first day wasn’t actually that hard. You were bored out of your mind, and this elephant’s ass stunk to high heaven, don’t get me wrong, but if this was the worst of it you could wait it out. You even fell asleep from exhaustion later that night. Day two was worse. You were really hungry and thirsty, but you feared that speaking up would anger your elephant captor, so you kept quiet.

Day three was the worst. You had to go to the bathroom really bad and held it in for hours. The day went on excruciatingly slow, but eventually the elephant remembered you were back there. She just got into her room, getting off her shift, the alarm on her nightstand read 12:41 a.m. Well, the kid certainly last three days inside her. It was fun while it lasted. The huge elephant woman dropped her pants and climbed onto her bed, squatting and letting out bubbly farts, until you were firmly pressed through the fleshy donut of her butthole and plop down onto the bed. She elephant spoke, “Well, you did well kid. I’ll miss ya’ being up my butt, but a deal’s a deal.”

You look out the window, dazed but worried. It was pitch-black outside. Were you really inside her butt for three days? How did your parents feel about this? They must be freaking out right now. Despite your troublemaking ways you knew you had to get home and try to think up an explanation as soon as possible. You look over towards the door, “Can I…?” The elephant finishes, “Go! Sure! But you’d better go quick, before I change my mind.” She grinned and winked at you.

That was all you needed to hear to get you to bolt out of there. You ran down the hotel halls at top speed, not really sure where you were going. You may have escaped the elephant’s butt, but how do you plan to escape this Casino? After only a few dozen feet you gasp for air and put your hands on your knees, not eating or drinking for three days really took a lot out of you. Like it or not, you had to take care of yourself first before moving onto escaping. So what now?
124122221321.title: You somehow managed to last for the few days...

Lioness
1241222214.content:
While you were trapped inside the stinky elephant butthole your captor got to work, advertising the newly opened bar to patrons. Although she wasn’t paying much attention to her job, she was much too wrapped up in enjoying your squirms in her butt. She moaned and her eyes rolled back a bit, one of the anthro patrons noticed this. She was initially confused but then put two-and-two together. A devious grin formed as she approached the elephant, “Um, excuse me Ms.?” The elephant snapped out of it and chuckled nervously, “Uh, yes. Would you like to know more about Bunnie Casino’s newest bar instillation?”

The other curvy anthro shook her head and giggled, “I’d much rather know about who you got squirming between your cheeks.” Your elephant captor blushed, “Uh, just some human boy I ran into. I think he’s a sneak in. Looks much too young for this kind of place.” The curvy anthro cooed, “A sneak in, huh? He should really be punished for that.” With a flex of her anus the elephant squeezed you, making you cry. The elephant smirked, “Already taken care of.” The other anthro giggled, “Mind if I play with him some too. You know what they say… two anthro’s are better than one.”

You could barely hear what they were talking about out there, the thick walls of flesh blocking most of your hearing. But no matter what it was you doubt it was good. The elephant sighed in disappointment, “I’d love to, but I still have three more hours on this shift.” The other anthro grinned and winked, “Selling the new Casino Bar, eh? I could get a friend to fill in for ya’.” The elephant perked up, “Really?” The other anthro nodded and turned to an anthro horse woman near the slots, “Ay! Jessica!” The horse woman approached and after a bit of talking and giving Jess the horse woman a few twenties to compensate, the elephant and her fellow curvy anthro friend were off to torment you.

You had no idea what was happening, but you thought all hope was lost. You’d be trapped in this elephants behind forever. Unfortunately for you, you don’t know how wrong you are. You feel the inside of the elephant anus start to quiver and shake. With a slow and nasty fart, you are pushed out of the fleshy butthole ring and painfully fall onto a freezing tiled floor. You look around and realize you’re in some kind of locker room. You look up to see two anthros grinning smugly down at you, the elephant you were trapped in and a curvy anthro…
1241222214.title: She runs into another curvy anthro in a costume...

choices: Yes! You run back out to the performance hall
No! The elephant woman plops her ass right on top of you
No! The woman turns and belly flops right on top of you
For now, but the woman gives chase.
12412223.content:
The outfit you had gotten tangled up in was so strappy, it was nearly impossible to figure out which end was up. Fortunately for you, because it was designed for an elephant woman it was also incredibly large. As soon as your would-be captress lifted the outfit, you slipped right out of it!

Well, tumbled topsy turvy and fell on your backside right out of it is more accurate, but the important thing was that you were free!

The elephant woman's eyes shot open and she gasped as she saw you fall and tumble a few feet away from her. She moved toward you as soon as she saw your unwitting escape.

"Oh no you don't you little perv! One way or another you're getting punished!" she called.

That was all you needed to hear as you scrambled to your feet to try to get away.


The question is....are you able to?
12412223.title: Momentary Escape

choices: Head straight to the bar
Approach the anthros in the booth
You bump into a drunk patron
Someone grabs you
Something Else
13.content:
You follow the signs until you are led into the bar. It was just as lavish as the rest of the casino. Bright, multi-colored neon signs decorated the walls, the floor bore the same black marble as the lobby, and patrons crowded the various booths and tables. In the very center of the room was where the actual bar was located, along the walls were the booths and scattered across the rest of the area were tables that seated patrons. The patrons who weren’t seated at the bar were served by waitresses. Then you noticed something strange, much like the lobby there were many human women scattered about the bar, but there were also male and female anthro animals of various different species throughout the bar.

You scanned the bar in wonderment, not only at the lavish furnishings but also at the odd patrons. You brushed off your worries, however, enticed by the idea of drinking alcohol. You just hoped no one would ask for I.D. since you aren’t old enough yet to legally drink. Stepping into the bar you were hit with a noxious smell. You couldn’t tell where it was coming from but there was an odd stink that flooded the area. Maybe someone just farted. Besides the smell you were really excited, your first time in a bar, where you would hopefully have your first drink. You wondered where you should go first. The bar looked like it was teeming with activity, but you notice a group of anthros in a booth beckoning for you to join them. What should you do?
13.title: To the Bar

choices: "Come On Back Here so I Can Show You Something."
"We Have A Special Drink For People Like You"
"You Look Old Enough, Here's A Drink"
131.content:
You worked up the nerves to head towards the bar, where a curvy tiger woman standing about ten feet tall made her way to you. You gulped, growing nervous at the thought of asking for a drink. She grinned at the sight of you, before starting up some basic conversation.

"So what'll it be?" She said seductively, a grin on her face seeming to hide the inner workings of her mind. You muttered up something fast.

"Just a beer please." You stuttered, as her eyes squinted.

"You're speaking kind of strange, would you mind showing me your ID? Wouldn't want to serve someone underage after all." She said in a tone which almost seemed like she knew already.

"Uhhhh" You muttered, before she shook her head, confirming her theory of your age.

"Alright kid, here's the deal."
131.title: ID?

choices: Swallow, and Start To Get Really Sleepy
Swallow, and Notice The World Getting Bigger
Spit it Out, Right Into The Face of The Bear Woman
1312.content:
The tigress' grin grew, as she shook her head. "Well you just happen to be in luck, we have a great treat for people like you lacking ID, trust me, it's perfect for you." She said, reaching below the bar and pulling up a strangely bottled drink. It was colored light blue, and different than most beers, but it seemed normal other than that. She popped the cap off, and handed it to you, the same strange smile lighting her orange striped face up.

"Thanks." You mutter, before sitting down atop a barstool. It was higher up than usual, probably due to the sheer size of most patrons, but you were comfortable despite your dangling legs. You looked around the bar room and observed the giant animal-people going about their business, laughing, drinking, and talking like anyone else would in a normal bar.

That was when a giant bear woman sat next to you, so large that her sides pushed into you. You scooted over, hoping to separate yourself from the beast of a woman. It was somewhat successful, with the only part of her touching you being the tips of warm fur, but it wasn't the most ideal situation. The tigress was still in your general area, seeming to lurk around you as the glances you kept getting continued. Many animals were licking there lips upon catching you in their gaze, others winking or turning their ass towards you.

Trying to get your mind off the possibilities that these things were willing to do to you, you turn to your drink. Not having tried it yet, you bring it to your lips, letting some of the blue fluid slip into your mouth. Next, you
1312.title: 'Special' Drink

choices: The bird
The gator
The tiger
132.content:
You didn’t really know what was up with the anthros, but a few of them were gesturing to you from a nearby booth, and you couldn’t really bring yourself to ignore them. You walked nervously up to their table, to see three women sharing a round of drinks; one a pudgy alligator, one a muscular tiger, and one a posh bird. As you grew closer, you realized they were all a solid few feet taller than you, which, combined with their strange animal features, was a little intimidating. “Well, aren’t you just the cutest thing! I could just eat you up,” the alligator woman said, with a smile on her face that showed her countless, huge teeth. “Come sit with us!”

You hesitantly climb up into the booth, feeling small surrounded by the three humongous ladies. With a giggle, the alligator woman wraps an arm around your side, pressing you against her pillowy, chubby side. “I don’t know, Lily,” the tiger narrowed her eyes. “I’m no human expert, but this one looks a bit young to be milling around the casino, much less the bar…”

“I-I’m 21,” you stutter.

“Mhmm, and I’m 70. Seriously, you look like you’re barely out of high school,” she glared, and you averted her feline gaze, staring nervously at the floor.. “Trying to sneak a drink, huh? I have half a mind to turn you over to the bouncer, ‘young man’...” Your heart sinks at the thought. If your parents found out you had snuck in here, you were dead meat.

Seeing your horrified reaction, the bird can barely contained herself, bursting out laughing. “Bah, relax! She’s just messin’ around with ya, kid! The casino’s all about having a good time,” she said, sliding a half-empty pint glass across the table to you. “Here, wanna try a sip?”

“Oh! R-really, I can just…?” You said, a huge smile on your face as you shakily held up the glass. You hesitated, looking up at her for approval, only for the bird to smile and nod. “Uh, hah, okay! I mean, I never…” Eventually, you work up the nerve to bring the glass to your lips and take a sip. You were immediately struck by how bitter it tasted, and how much it seemed to burn going down. “Oh! Bleh…” You reacted, sticking out your tongue in distaste.

“Pfft! Not a Guinness man, I take it?” She giggled at your reaction, sliding the glass back to herself.

With that, the three of them went back to talking about… something. You couldn’t really decipher their conversation. Something about shoes? “So, uh…” You say, trying to sate your curiosity. “... what are you guys?”

“... don’t tell me you don’t know what an anthro is,” the gator blinks.

“I knew it. You snuck in here, didn’t you?” The tiger glared.

Your heart sinks once again. You couldn’t quite tell what was going on, but you could tell you’ve made a mistake. “... um… hypothetically, what would you do if I said ‘yes’?” With that, they all groaned.

“Oh no…” The bird frowned, her tone suddenly seeming very serious.. “Sneaking in here was a very, very bad idea. You have no idea what you’ve signed up for.”

“What do you mean? What did I sign up for?” You ask, your eyes wide.

“Well, uh… how do I put this?” She stroked her chin. “The casino caters to a very special sort of… clientele, and among them, there’s pretty much an open season on human males.”

“‘Open season’?” You asked, your voice becoming more and more frantic. “What? What are they going to do?”

“Anything. Any gal can do whatever she wants to ya. Including gobble ya up,” the gator said, absentmindedly gesturing to her belly. You didn’t comprehend her at first… but then, her statement starts to set in. Animals devour eachother alive all the time in the wild. What’s stopping these anthros from doing the same? They were certainly large and strong enough to devour you with ease. Especially when the entire casino seems catered to such a thing...

“Oh…” You groaned, suddenly feeling strangely dizzy. Your entire body was shaking as your slowly stood up from the booth. “I think I’m going to… get out of here…” You say, weakly, your only thought was escaping the way you came.

“You can’t, pal. You’re locked in here,” the tiger said, putting a hand on your shoulder before you could walk. “Only way out is to talk to Bunnie herself. And she probably won’t be happy to hear you snuck in.” You pushed her hand away by instinct, shivering at the anthro’s touch. From the look on your face, it seemed you were about to have a panic attack any moment now.

“Oh, come on. You’re scaring the poor dear,” the bird frowned, lifting a wing. “Listen, we’ll take care of ya, kid. Just stick with us. We’ll get this allll sorted out.” As you stood there, shivering, she used her other to wing to lift you back into the booth and place you on her huge lap. With that, she hugged you gently against her like a teddy bear, letting you relax against her huge, warm body. “There, there. Everything’s going to be just fine. You just made a little mistake — that’s all. Not the end of the word,” she reassured you, in an almost motherly tone. She seemed convinced everything was going to turn out okay. The gator and the tiger didn’t seem so certain.

Eventually, the cradling of the larger woman has mostly calmed you down. The anthro women went back to talking to eachother about whatever they were talking about — their voices just sort of faded into the background noise at this point. Eventually, they finish their drinks and start standing up from the booth. You’re disappointed when you’re pried from the bird woman’s arms, but you suppose all good things must come to an end. You at least get to hold her ‘hand’ as they walk around the beautiful casino.

“Alright, well, before we get busy, we should get this fella to our hotel room. Make sure nobody snatches him up from under our noses,” the tiger says as they approach the betting room. “Since there are no locks, somebody’s going to have stay there and watch over ‘im. Who’s it gonna be?” You were a little nervous as they decided. You knew that the bird woman wouldn’t do anything inappropriate with you, but as for the tiger and the gator, you couldn’t be so sure. You really didn't want to be alone with them.

Who ends up taking you to the room?
132.title: Starting to Regret This

choices: You stay inside for a little while longer
You want out immediately!
1322.content:
“Oh, you guys go ahead. I’d be more than happy to keep an eye on him,” the gator woman says, a big smile donning on her face.

“... you sure about that?” The tiger raised a brow.

“Of course! Like I’d ever let anything happen to such an adorable little man!” The gator smiled, and you squealed in surprise as she suddenly lifted you up, hugging you against her big, soft belly like a teddy bear. She was wearing a crop top which revealed her round tummy in all its glory, so you were pressed directly against her soft scales.

“Alright, well, have fun, you two,” the tiger said with a smirk, as the two other women walked off to parts unknown. You gasped for fresh air as the gator finally released you from the tight bear hug, turning you around to face her.

“Come on, fella! Let’s get you somewhere safe!” She said, taking you by the hand and leading you excitedly through the halls of the casino. You were a little uncomfortable with being left alone with her after seeing the mischievous look she had in her eye when she volunteered. Watching her body jiggle as she walked, you couldn’t help but wonder what she could be eating that made her so chubby...

You had been wondering what they meant by ‘hotel’, but as the gator led you deeper into the casino, you realize there was indeed a hotel built directly into the casino. The longer you walked, the more you were impressed by the sheer scale of this place. This must be the biggest casino in the world! “... so, anybody can just waltz into whatever hotel room they want?” You asked, noticing all the hotel room doors just hanging open.

“Yup!” She said, as she finally led you into one of the rooms. “All the rooms are free, and with the cameras everywhere, there’s no need to worry about thieves or anything.” You suddenly noticed all the tiny security cameras hidden all over the place. You spotted three on the ceiling of the room alone, leaving not an inch of the room uncovered. There was even a camera in the bathroom, for goodness sake! Apparently, the patrons here didn’t care about privacy very much. “Go on, make yourself at home!”

You crash on the nearest bed, flicking on the TV to see a generic police procedural drama airing. There was only one catch; all the characters were anthros! “Whoa! There are anthro TV shows?” You said. You had figured that anthros were unique to this place, but if they had their own television shows, there must be more of them than you had assumed. “How come I’ve never seen any of you guys before?”

“Oh, Bunnie Casino is just one of the only anthro vacation spots around here,” she said, and you nodded. You guess that made sense. “The trip is sort of expensive, too. I can only afford to visit Earth every few months or so…”

“Wait… what do you mean, ‘visit Earth’?” You did a double-take.

She doesn’t seem to even register your question, too excited by what she sees on the TV. “Ooo, is this Vulpine Detective? I love this show! Scoot over!” She smiled, and you only had a few seconds to dodge out of the way before she flopped butt-first onto the bed. You yelped in surprise as the force of her landing almost sent you flying off the mattress, the bed creaking beneath her weight. “Ooops, hehe! Sorry!” She giggles, seeing the look on your face.

You try to watch the show, but it’s difficult to get comfortable when the huge gator woman takes up most of the bed, confining you to the very edge. Eventually, she notices your discomfort. “Aww, you don’t got to sit like that, cutie. Come here,” she said, and you shuddered in surprise as she lifts you up again. This time, she sets you down on your lap. Once again, she crosses her arms around you and hugs you against her belly, though this time she was much more gentle. Even sat on her lap, your head barely reached her chest, further reminding you of just how small you were compared to her. Despite your hesitation, it was actually quite comfortable to snuggle up with the huge reptile woman, and you almost fall asleep in her arms…

Suddenly, you’re roused for the slumber by the sound of the gator’s huge stomach loudly gurgling. “Oh,” you said with a smirk, looking up at her. “Are you hungry?”

“Oh, hehe! Yes, I suppose it’s been a long time since I had breakfast,” she giggles, blushing.

“Want something to eat?” You asked, excited to see what other restaurants they had at the casino.

“Ah! I thought you’d never ask!” To your surprise, she lifts you up in the air again. You thought she was just going to set you on the ground, but instead, she lifted you up to eye-level.

“Wait, w-what are you doing?” You stuttered, a little nervous with how the alligator was suddenly manhandling you. Instead of responding, she simply opens her long jaws terrifyingly wide, revealing her razor sharp teeth, moist tongue, and most terrifyingly, her dark, cavernous throat. Before you could even react, you were shoved headfirst into that sticky tunnel. “Mph!” Your cry of surprise was muffled by the scales of her neck as her throat muscles squeeze around your head.

The amount of power she had over you were terrifying beyond words. You could do nothing to resist as she leaned her head back, and you felt the very force of gravity pulling you down her stretchy throat. You gripped the walls of her mouth, trying your best not to fall in… but your efforts were for naught, as with a swallow, the gator’s throat muscles clench down and pull you deeper. You should be kicking wildly, but you were so taken aback by what was happening that you don’t even remember to resist, instead freezing up in fear.

You were scrawny even by human standards, so the huge gator woman found it easy to slurp you up like a noodle. Your heart was nearly beating out of your chest as she effortlessly worked you deeper and deeper. She was probably capable of swallowing you in one gulp — the only reason you weren’t already inside her stomach was because she wanted to savor your taste for just a little while longer. Eventually, though, she got bored of running her tongue all over your salty arms and legs, and took one last gulp.

You’re pressed unceremoniously in her stomach, now soaked in sticky, smelly juices. You wipe the saliva from your eyes, taking in your surroundings in horror. The gastric folds of her stomach were smooth and pink, and seemed to undulate rhythmically as her stomach gurgled and groaned all around you. You didn’t even bother to contemplate how you had air and light in here. “Oh no, oh no, oh no!” You panicked, immediately pressing your hands against the walls. “Oh God! Please! Don’t do this!”

“... huh?” She asks, surprised by your reaction.

“Please! I’m not food!” You beg, tears in your eyes. “I don’t want to die! Not like this!”

She pauses for a moment, trying to register the situation. “What are you talking about?” She said. “First off, I, uh, thought you were offering yourself as my dinner. Guess I mighta jumped the gun there, sorry. Second, you’re not going to die, silly.”

You freeze, confused. “... you’re not going to d-digest me?” You ask, your voice filled with both hope and confusion.

“Well, of course I wouldn’t digest you! Do I look like an animal to you?” She said, as if surprised you’d even consider that a possibility.

“... yes,” you replied, frankly.

“... well, fair point,” she rolls her eyes, “but it’s against the rules to digest an innocent human like you, anyway. That’d just be a waste of a perfectly good belly stuffer!”

You cease your struggles, wondering you were hearing her right. “... s-so... you’re saying I’m safe in here?”

“Well, of course! Sorry for scaring ya, but I just love the taste of human, and I wanted to feel somethin’ wriggle around in there a bit,” she smiles, her tone almost motherly as she leaned back in bed, rubbing her hands gently over her round belly. It was already so big, you didn’t even make a bulge. “You’ll be just fine in there.”

You blink, registering what she had just told you. It was a lot to take in. You didn’t even know it was possible for something to survive in something else’s stomach… especially not a carnivore’s. Sure enough, though, there didn’t seem to be any acid in here, and there was more than enough air to breathe. It was actually surprisingly roomy and soft inside her gut. You silently reevaluate everything you thought you knew about biology as you get comfortable inside her stomach.

“So… can I come out?” You said. The gator’s belly was so comfy, it managed to quickly relax you, but you still weren’t sure if you could really trust her or not.

“Hmm… well, if you really want me too, I’ll certainly let you out,” she frowns, “but I’ve sort of been wanting to go back to the casino and play with the girls some more, while I know you’re somewhere safe. It’d certainly beat lounging around the hotel room, right?” You consider it. You didn’t know how trustworthy these anthros were, but still, her belly was so warm and comfortable, you kind of wanted to stick around inside her for a little while longer...
1322.title: Gator Food

choices: ... the Performance Hall
... a nice restaurant
13221.content:
“Umm…” You said, feeling around, getting a feel for the place. Now that you’ve calmed down, it actually wasn’t that bad. It was surprisingly roomy, and the warmth and wetness made you feel like you were sitting around in a sauna. Subconsciously, it made you feel like you were back in the womb, instilling a deep and primal sense of safety and comfort. “I guess it’s not so bad in here…”

“Hmhmhm! Glad to see you’re coming around,” she snorted triumphantly, patting her satisfied gut as climbed out of bed. “Well, I’ll head back to the casino, then. Don’t be afraid to ask if you need anything in there.” Her belly softly swung to and fro as she walked down the halls, further relaxing you. Her belly was already so big, any bystanders she passed would have no idea there was currently a young man wrapped up in her stomach. You were completely cut off from the outside world, all your worries seeming trivial and distant now. All you had to think about was the warmth and comfort of another’s embrace.

“Leonda? Why are you here? Where’s the boy?” The bird woman asked, surprised to see the gator walking up to them seemingly alone.

“Oh, don’t worry. I stored him somewhere safe,” she smirked, patting her belly.

“Leonda, you weren’t supposed to go eating him!” The tiger complained, certain you were going to be traumatized.

“Oh, chill. Trust me, he’s lovin’ it in there,” the gator waved a hand dismissively, sitting down at the machine beside the tiger. “Now let's get down to business…” The other two women were a bit surprised and incredulous to hear that. You had just learned what anthros were just a few minutes ago, and already you enjoyed being eaten? It seemed impossible… but you didn’t seem to be struggling in there, so they opted to let sleeping dogs lie. Within moments, the three women returned to their games, largely forgetting about you.

You listen the soothing, rhythmic beating of the woman’s heart as the gentle swadling of her stomach lures you into an almost meditative trance. Unable to keep your eyes open, you patch in and out of sleep as the gator embroils herself in games of chance. You can faintly hear people talking, but you can’t make out what they’re saying; the only voice you can really hear is Leonda’s. You’ve mostly slipped her mind, though she does show off her belly to throw off some human gals at a poker game, and brags about having swallowed you at the bar.

A couple hours later, the trio stumbles laughing and chatting back into the hotel room, discussing their plans for the evening. “Leonda, y’might want to let him out before we leave,” you faintly heard the tiger woman say.

“Oh, yeah! Heh, I forgot he was in there. He’s out like a light,” Leonda smiles, patting her belly with a giggle as she disappears into the bathroom. You wriggle in place a little bit, confused. Were you about to be let out, at last? Surely enough, you can hear the gator woman start coughing you up, as her stomach contracts tightly around you, forcing you back up her esophagus. Your relaxation is rudely interrupted as she starts forcing you back up her throat just as easily as she gulped you down, spitting you out into what felt like a porcelain bathtub.

You clenched your eyes shut, holding a hand up in front of her face. Compared to her stomach, the outside world felt like it was freezing cold, and the light seemed blinding. You groaned as your eyes adjusted to the light, turning to see the gator moistening her scales in the mirror. Something struck you immediately, though; she was as naked as the day she was born! You took a single glance of her huge, sagging breasts before blushing and turning away. “You’re… naked!” You point out frantically, your mind still a little groggy.

“Mhmm. What’s your point?” She says, nonchalantly. “You will be, too, in a moment. You need a shower, lil’ man.” Apparently, the anthro didn’t really think of it as a big deal if you saw her body, and you guess that made sense, considering you were just inside of it a few moments ago. Still, you were too embarrassed to stare. This was, though, the first time you’ve actually seen a grown woman in the buff in person, so you couldn’t help but steal a few innocent peeks. Why would a reptile have breasts, you wonder?

Eventually, the curvy alligator slid on a much fancier outfit than what she was wearing; this time an actual halter dress, rather than just a crop top and jeans. “Hop to it. We’ve got places to be,” she said as she walked out of the bathroom, leaving you to your own devices. You were a little nervous about taking a shower in front of the security cameras… but surely, nobody was watching you, right? The cameras were probably just for the deterrence factor. Yeah…

Eventually, you stumbled out of the bathroom in some spare clothing, to see that the trio seemed to have just finished dressing up. They all now looked absolutely fabulous! “Good to see you again, lad. I was worried Leonda might hog you to herself all week,” the tiger smiled.

“Pfft! Can’t say I wasn’t thinking about it,” the gator laughs.

“Hi, guys,” you said, waving a hand groggily, still a little disoriented by the outside world. “What’s with the get-ups?”

After their spree at the casino, the trio’s were getting ready to head to...
13221.title: Warm Shower

choices: Slots
Poker
Roulette
132212.content:
Remarkably, your temporary stay in the reptile woman’s digestive system wasn’t traumatizing in the slightest. From your perspective, it was just warm, comfortable, intimate... almost like returning to the womb. It’s certainly shown you that you have nothing to fear from the three lovely ladies, although their size may be a little intimidating. You follow close behind them as they stroll through the casino, fortunes being won and lost all around you. Compared to the silence and serenity of the gator’s stomach, the flashing lights and cacophony of laughs and shouting in the casino was giving you a headache.

As they walked, the trio talk among each other about their favorite TV shows or family drama or whatever. You weren’t really listening. You just try to focus on staying between them, unnerved by the lustful looks a few of the other patrons were giving you as you passed. Eventually, they stepped into a huge and surprisingly beautiful restaurant built into the casino itself. It seemed there was nothing this casino didn’t have. Eventually, you all take a seat in some booths in the corner, and you finally work up the nerve to interrupt their chatting. “So… not to be a bother or anything, but, uh, can we talk about all that stuff you said earlier?” You pipe up. “About, well, me not being able to leave?”

They all have weird looks on their faces as they turn to you. “We’ll go talk to Bunnie tomorrow. See if we can get all that… sorted out,” the tiger sighs.

“Tomorrow? Why not tonight?” You ask, a tiny bit panicked. You really wanted to get home today, before your parents found out you snuck in here.

“I wouldn’t rush it, if I was you,” she grimaces. “Once Bunnie finds out you snuck in, you might… have a bad time.”

“W-what do you mean?” You blink.

“Let’s start from the beginning!” The bird woman chimes in, talking in a much more soothing and tentative tone. “Er… how do I explain this? When human males walk in here, they aren’t considered patrons, really. They’re more like… entertainment.” She said, blushing as she tries to choose her words very carefully. “Basically, if one of the gals here gets their paws on you, they can ‘toy’ with you however they want, as long as they don’t actually hurt you.”

“Wha… bu...” You stutter, getting a sinking feeling.

“The thing is, human men who come in here usually negotiate some kind of waiver over how long they’ll be staying. Basically sign their rights away for a period,” she stares down at the glass in front of her, “but you snuck in illegally. Which means Bunnie never agreed to let you go. If she wants, she can keep you here… forever.”

You feel your heart drop. Forever? You were only planning on staying for a few hours! Could they really trap you in this crappy little casino for your entire life? That couldn’t possibly be legal… could it? “Now, now. It’s really not as bad as it sounds. Bunnie’s a pretty understanding woman. I’m sure we can work out some sort of deal,” she frowned, “but in the meantime, stay very close to us, okay? If someone else snatches you up, we might not be able to get you back…”

Noticing you were shivering, the avian wraps a wing around your shoulder and snuggles you up against her warm, feathery side. “There, there. Poor thing. Trust me, we’ll get this all sorted out. Don’t you worry about a thing…” She whispers as she cuddled you, her tone almost maternal. You gripped her side as you tried to suppress your panic, letting the woman hide you from sight beneath her huge wing, covering you in her warmth. You hear her giggle, the bird obviously finding you adorable.

Eventually, a waitress in a fancy uniform revealing enough to rival Hooters stopped by your table with drinks. As you soothe your sore throat with some refreshingly cool water, you realized just how painfully hungry you were. How long were you out? You eagerly search through the menu, only to realize you don’t recognize a single item. This restaurant only seemed to serve strange, alien food you’ve never heard of. Before you knew it, though, the waitress had returned, and was staring at you expectantly. “Oh! I-I’ll have the, uh… germinated nitro-squid calamari?” You squint as you read off a random name from the menu, eager to fill your stomach with anything.

When you finally receive your order, though, you’re baffled by what you see. While the trio starts chowing down eagerly on their bizzare dish of choice, you were silently poking at your calamari with your fork, trying to deduce whether it was even edible. “Why is it… green?” You ask, wrinkling your nose in distaste at the smell.

“Oh, that’s sort of interesting. Y’see, nitro-squids are actually born orange, but over time, they absorb the pigment from all the whale frogs they eat…” The gator woman smiled in between huge mouthfuls of food.
