You started to whimper like a lost dog as Oscar continued to gulp you down. They're was a pulling on your legs at the end of the cavernous cave. You were being eaten. You were scared. Oscar noticed this and began to stroke you gently with his hands, the part of you that wasent already in his mouth, anyways. You found yourself leaning into them, wanting to be anywhere but where you were now. But as nice as the hippo was, he wasn't going to give up a meal for it.

Time passed by, and soon your whole world was plunged into darkness as Oscar shoved your head in between his lips and over his front teeth. The gentle pulling on your legs was now firm and demanding, while the hippo’s tongue rolled over you relentlessly, barey giving you any time to breath. You didn’t fight back, though. You were scared shitless and wanted out desperately, but you felt like you owed it to the pachyderm.

The moment you felt your neck fall into Oscar’s esophagus, you felt your feet fall into his stomach. You wiggles your feet around, free from their restrictive grasp and felt around the open area. It felt a lot less empty ten you thought a stomach should feel, but your thoughts were interrupted by your head being engulfed into the long way down to it.

Oscar breathed a sigh of relief as he swallowed the last bits of you down, and began to trace a finger down his neck, feeling you travel down. He held his belly with the other hand, feeling it grow even heavier as your body entered in slowly. Your legs bunched up along the stomach lining, but not a bulge could be seen through all that fat.

The sound of Oscar’s heartbeat rang through your ears as you passed his chest. Everything was sweltering hot and humid, the powerful muscles pulsating in a rhythmic pattern as they kept pushing you down. You only had time to breath in between those pulses, warm, stale air entering your lungs as you went Your way last His.

At long last, you were deposited into Oscar’s stomach. There was more room to move around now, but not much. It was completely pitch black, you couldn't see the end of your nose. The sounds of churning and groaning surrounded you like an orchestra. You ran your hands and feet along the edges of the stomach walls. There was no acid, at least you hoped there weren’t, instead there was only more goopey, slimy saliva. Gross, but a better alternative then what you though you were going to get wh n you agreed to this crazy offer.

“Hey...hey human?” You hear Oscar’s voice boom above you. “Can you here me?”

“Yeah...yeah I can hear you, Oscar!” You shouted in response, trying to hear yourself over the unrelenting cacophony. “Can you hear me?!”

“Loud and clear, little guy.” You feel your entire world shame as Oscar belly laughs. “How are you holding up in there?”

“It’s...it’s dark, Oscar!” You shout. “It’s dark, and loud, and hot, and slimy!”

“Buuuut...” Oscar trails off purposely, drumming his fingers on his swollen belly.

“But...but it’s kinda nice, I guess.” You admit to yourself and your hippo master. You stopped shouting, but Oscar could still here you. “It’s sorta...soft. Soft and warm, like a jacuzzi.”

“Mmmmmm...” Oscar muffed as he rubbed both hands over his You filled tummy. “I’m glad you like it there, sweetie. Do you wanna take a nap while I head over to the buffet?”

“Do...do you mind?” You ask, suddenly realizing your energy was being sapped away amid the heat, the comfort, and the soothing white noise of Oscar’s insides.

“Not at all, cutie. Gets some rest.” Oscar patted his stomach affectionately and began walking with you safely inside him. You felt yourself swaying back and forth along with his globular gut, rocking you to sleep like toddler. You yawned and let yourself rest your eyes again before you had to go back to ‘work’.
1421321321213133221123.title: Oscar carries you to the buffet in his belly

choices: The elephant couple
The raunchy horse
The two mice and their bear butler
14213213212131332211231.content:
The gently swaying slimy cavern holding you rocks you to sleep in under a minute. How, of all places, the inside of a hippo's stomach could be so comfortable would mystify you for some time. Maybe Oscar was giving it a helping hand, gently massaging you through that thick layer of belly fat. None of that bothered you anymore. Just before your eyes closed you hear the hippo say one last thing:
"Thank you."

When you open your eyes again the first thing you do is cover them to shield yourself from the bright light. Wait, light? You realize the comforting warmth is gone, along with the constant motion of Oscar's stomach walls. You're not in his belly anymore. You look around, trying to make sense of things. You were sitting atop a soft bench of some kind, part of a booth not unlike what you'd find in a diner. Except everything was scaled up for people far larger than you. Before you could continue to gain your bearings a large arm wrapped around you and pulled you into a blubbery flank.

"Hello again, human." Oscar announced cheerily, before taking another big bite of his sandwich.

"Oscar...? What..." You sputter back, confused by everything that was going on.

"You were so cute. When I coughed you back up you didn't even wake, so I cleaned you up as softly as I could and carried you here. You must be starving. Here, try one of these." He dragged in a thick pillow for you to sit on and handed you a piece of his sandwich. You took one bite and in an instant you understood how someone could become as fat as Oscar in this place. You had never tasted a more perfect sandwich in your life. It helped that you were starving, but the rich flavor alone was heavenly. You wolf down your meal and ask the hippo for another. He happily obliges.

"Did you have fun?" He asked between gobbling up those big sandwiches whole.

You paused for a moment. Thinking back on the last day there shouldn't be any way for you to say you enjoyed yourself. From the moment you introduced yourself you'd been used as a cushion and a toy. You were forced to endure his weight and play with his cock repeatedly. You tried to follow Leo's advice and enjoy yourself a little, but with such crazy, lewd acts you weren't sure that'd ever be possible. And then to cap things off he ate you. Stranger yet, you let him eat you. You couldn't quite believe it yourself.

"Yes. It'll take a lot of getting used to, but volunteering for you was... fun? It certainly wasn't as painful as I'd feared." Oscar laughs heartily at your reaction. Petting you gently and retrieving his phone from his shorts. He selected a number from speed dial and began talking.

"Hey, Oscar here, from 309. Can I speak to Leo please? Yes, I'll hold... Hey Leo, Oscar here. Good news, I think he kinda likes it... Yeah, I know, right... Anyway, I'm calling to tip him... Yeah, 3000 should be enough... Okay, thanks and bye." You listened intently to the exchange. Was Leo about to come in for some more 'fun' now that he knew you weren't completely averse to it? More curiously, did you just get a tip? You ask Oscar to explain a little further.

"Tips are exactly what they sound like. If we like a volunteer very much, we can give him or her a little bonus. 3000 dollar should be enough, right?" Your jaw nearly hit the table, hearing the hippo talk about such figures so casually. "That's huge! Are you sure you can afford that?" Oscar raises a curious brow at your response, before flying into a fit of laughter.

"Haha, I suppose from your perspective we would all be stinking rich here. Let's just say that our society is a little bit wealthier than yours. Bunnie's Casino is not the cheapest holiday destination, but with live human volunteers like you, it's worth every penny. Just take it from me, I'm not gonna lose any sleep over that tip. You've definitely earned it." You blush brightly, knowing that your reward was in no small part a thank you for helping him jerk off... twice. The two of you keep chatting back and forth as you enjoy the breakfast buffet until even Oscar's big belly can't fit another bite.

"Alright human, this is where we part ways. I've got some things I need to do and it wouldn't be fair for the others if I just hogged you all the time. How long is your contract?"

"One month." You reply cheerily.

"Nice. I'm going to be here for three more weeks. So if you ever wanna have some more fun or you just need a comfy place to sleep, feel free to come knocking on my door. Maybe we can watch another movie together. You know where to find me, right?"

"Room 309, don't worry. I won't forget it anytime soon." You answer with a smile.

"Good. If you're ever back for another contract whilst I'm around I'll make sure I'm the first to put in a reservation for you." Oscar happily announced, making you blush brightly. He wrapped you in one last smothering hug before setting you down and walking off. In a strange way you were going to miss his blubbery embrace. But now you were on your own. What were you even supposed to do? Find Leo? You just wander around, looking at the many other booths and the strange guests in them.

The first to catch your eye is a pair of elephants. As big as Oscar was, these two made him look puny. They measured close to eighteen feet at a glance and were busy devouring the richly laid out buffet before them. They wore wide jeans and colorful T-shirts. One of them was clearly female, her large bosom looking big enough to crush cars with. They occasionally looked around, but their attention was mostly focused on eachother, as they lovingly interrupted their feeding frenzy to gently feed eachother little bites. When the female elephant noticed you staring at them she directed your gaze up from her big breasts and to her equally big grin. With a sultry wink she made you blush, causing the male elephant to notice too. Thankfully he didn't fly into a fit of rage, thinking his girl was flirting with you. Instead he matched her smile. They mumbled among themselves, probably talking about you, before resuming their romantic meal.

You keep walking, looking around some more. A few booths further a lone male anthro horse was sitting back contently, a slew of empty plates before him. He looked incredibly pleased with himself, his belly shaking a little as he patted it. You couldn't quite determine what it was, but something seemed off about the whole scenario. Suddenly a human head pokes up from beneath the table, gasping for air. The horse glares down, grabs the man by the back of his head and pushes him back down. You swear you could hear muffled gagging and you see the horse shiftily looking around. You smirk a little, knowing that guest was receiving a little extra service under the table. You avoid your gaze though, before the horse might spot you and realize you saw what was going on. No doubt receiving a blowjob under the table wasn't quite so accepted here, given the horse's suddenly nervous appearance. And you really weren't in a rush to be called over and volunteer to take that unfortunate man's place.

Lastly you spotted a most curious trio sitting at a table. Well, one of them was sitting at least. A grizzled looking bear, easily as tall as Oscar but ten times as intimidating. His thousand yard stare looked like it could pierce steel. His fearsome appearance was only slightly lessened by the pristine black slacks and white vest he was wearing. He shared the booth with two anthro mice. Neither of them measured more than a foot in height, but that didn't seem to dampen their spirits. They sat on the table itself, taking tiny little pieces of the food before letting the bear devour the rest of it. They busily chittered among themselves, occasionally addressing the bear, who never replied with more than a grumpy huff. They talked loud enough for you to listen in. The bear was apparently their butler or servant or something like that. He was called Maurice. The mice were his masters and by the sound of it they were both women. You almost begin to understand the bear's dour demeanor when you suddenly hear their squeaky voices talk about a human. Their eyes fall on you and the mice quickly remark on your appearance. You blush listening to their compliments. Your blush goes up to eleven when they mention how fun you look to play with. After a while their attention turns back to eachother.

Suddenly a voice rings out to you. "Hey you. Human. Come here." Who was it?
14213213212131332211231.title: You’re let out before Oscar starts eating

choices: ...the pair decide to have some fun together
...the two split up, and you tag along with Ophelia
...the two split up, and you tag along with Alexey
142132132121313322112311.content:
You turn around to see the female of the two elephants from before waving you over with her trunk, while the male continued to feast on the buffet. You gulp as you begin to walk over towards them. Yesterday night, Oscar held the place of the tallest and fattest living thing you’ve ever seen, but his throne has been overtaken by a lovers pair under twice his height and quadruple yours. His antics only left you sore at the worse, but there was no telling what would happen with these two…

“Mmmm...my, what a scrumptious little thing you are!” The female elephant greeted you half jokingly and half seriously as you came in earshot of her. She was wearing what had to be the largest pair of jeans you had ever seen, and even than it only managed to cover half of her gelatinous, brown hided backside. Her green shirt had her belly fully on display as it churned and swelled with food, while her cleavage was practically bursting at the seams of her bra.

“I suppose this is where we introduce ourselves. You may call me Ophelia~” the elephant said with a flair of elegance. “Don’t be deceived by my pissant clothing, little one, I can clean up very nice...when I want to, at least. This here is my mate, Alexey.”

Alexey snorted as he pulled himself away from his food. He framed over his shoulder to look down on your diminutive form and smiled, acknowledging your presence before going back to the bounty of the buffet.

“He’s more of a doer than a talker.” Ophelia chuckled and patted the what little empty space next to her that wasn't overtaken by her thigh flab for you to sit down. You awkwardly obey and climb up the comically oversized booth and shuffled your place next to your new masters.She gave another polite giggle and ruffled your hair with her flabby hand. “If you don’t mind me saying so, you look a bit green around the edges. First day?”

“Second.” You reply curtly, mesmerized by the amount of food that was piled high on the table, and how fast it was flying into Alexey’s mouth and into his stomach. It probably took what he and his family ate for a week to fill him up for just one meal, and event hen he wouldn't be completely satisfied. “I’m...still getting used to everything.”

“Well than, I hope you can keep up with the two of us.” Ophelia smirked and patted her stomach like a death knell. “I’ll go easier with you than most slaves because your still feeling things out, but if you can’t take the heat it’s on you, understood?”

“Y-yes ma’am!” You stutter a little louder than you meant for it to come out.

“Great!” In a moment, the nearly 20 foot tall elephant went from deadly serious to jovial. “Now, just sit tight until we’re done eating. If you’re feeling adventurous, you can try grabbing some food for yourself, but just try to stay out of my radius.” She gave you a mischievous wink and turned her attention back to her meal, eating just as fast as Alexey but with more refinement.

Today was already proving itself to be another interesting one. For good or for worse you didn't know yet. You managed to help yourself to some of the fixons on the table before the two Elephants completely razed it, narrowly avoiding getting in their line of fire. You were going to have to be on your toes today, no more special treatment from an overbearing hippo to help you now.

After they finished eating...
142132132121313322112311.title: The Elephant Couple

choices: She hands you a toothpick. "Clean my mouth."
She wants a foot massage
She wants to toy with you
1421321321213133221123112.content:
The two elephants let out a huge belch in sync, giggling at eachother's timing. Their bellies are filled with enough food to last you weeks, but they'll probably be rumbling with hunger again by dinnertime. After your stay inside of Oscar there's a small pang of curiosity darting in the back of your mind. These bellies were twice as big. What would they feel like on the inside? Given what Ophelia told you before, you might find out sooner rather than later. After a few minutes of patting their massive bellies contently Alexey finally spoke up.

"Babe, I'ma hit the slots."

"You do that, dear. Just remember, if you're down over 2000, time to call it quits."

He simply huffed in response, sliding himself out of the booth and walking away. Ophelia watched him leave, making no secret about staring at his ass. When she notices your curious glare she smirks. "What? He's got big buns. I like a man with a nice ass." You blush a little, surprised by how openly she talks about his body. Ophelia motions for you to scoot over so she can exit the booth too. At least that's what you think her motion is, you just sorta guessed it after she began to shuffle towards you. Not wanting to get steamrollered beneath that enormous ass you quickly run to the edge of the seat and hop down. You give the elephant all the space she needs and patiently wait for her to get on her feet.

"Come on, human." She beckoned as she walked away. Even with her slow, ponderous steps you had a hard time keeping up with her. She quickly grew tired of having to wait for the little man and reached down. Her chubby hand wrapped around your torso and picked you up with frightening ease. To a woman her size you were little more than an oversized doll. She carried you down the halls, smiling at you with unsettling glee. Something told you that being carried was a favor. A favor she would expect you to repay. You try not to think about all the things she might ask of you, instead mustering up the courage to ask her some questions.

"Where are we going?"

"To our room, little man. That's where you'll be spending most of today." She looked down with a haughty smile, stopping her walk for a second to lift you up. You were staring right into those big, brown eyes of hers. "And before you ask what is expected of you, let me make it simple. You will do everything we tell you to, no ifs, buts or maybes. That's what people here will demand of their human slaves." You gulp loudly as she maintained her smile and continued walking.

"Why didn't you join your mate?"

The large hand holding you squeezed a little tighter. You were treading onto territory close to Ophelia's heart. She sighed wistfully and gave you an answer. "I'm not that interested in gambling... I know what you're thinking. 'Why'd you come to a casino then?' Bunnie's Casino offers so much more than slots and poker. I love watching the live performances and drinking their fancy cocktails. And their complement of humans is always... entertaining. Hopefully you can manage my expectations, newbie." Her fat fingers curled around your body even tighter, her immense strength easily overpowering you. You try to struggle, but it's of little use. Finally she realizes she's holding on to you a bit too fiercely and relaxes her grip. After a long walk down the corridors of the hotel she had reached her destination.

Ophelia comes to a stop in front of a huge door. It looked vast to you, but for her it was only just big enough. She even bowed her head a little walking in, just to be sure she wouldn't hit the doorframe. The elephant didn't even seem to register she did it. She was probably used to things being on the small side for someone of her prodigious size. "Here we are, room 574, my little slice of paradise."

She held you up to show off her room and the first thing you noticed was that some of the furniture was heavily reinforced. Chairs, the couch and the bed were all made with thick steel, presumably to handle two fat elephants. And you knew that at some point you would likely find yourself stuck between them. You could only hope their flabby bodies were malleable enough not to completely pulverize you. But those fears were for later, right now you were more worried about what Ophelia might ask of you. She walked over to the couch and casually dropped you on it. The elephant stood towering before you.

"You owe me one, little man. For carrying you here." You roll your eyes, smiling wryly. You knew this was coming. Fearfully you look up to meet her stern gaze. Ophelia actually had to lean forward quite a bit, looming over you menacingly, before her head popped up over the mountain of her gut and the hills of her rack. "Yes ma'am!" You stammer out awkwardly. "W...What is it you need?"

"Let's start with something easy, newbie. My dear Alexey should be joining us in about an hour, knowing his skill at slots. So until then you and I are going to keep busy together. Do well and I might even reward you. Tell me, do you know what a trunkjob is?" You shook your head, though you could imagine it being something involving her trunk and your member. You try not to think further about it. "Heh, you might be in for a treat then. Now for your task."
1421321321213133221123112.title: Getting to know Ophelia a little better

choices: You remain your ground and refuse
You swallow your pride and stuck your tongue out
You take off your shirt as a rag instead
14213213212131332211231122.content:
“Hmmm...let’s start with something simple, for now.” Ophelia nods after pondering for a moment, and took her seat on the coffee table opposite of the couch. The wood bends and cracks, but managed to support the elephants gargantuan girth. “Rub my feet.” She curtly orders, lifting up her large feet and revealing their bottoms to you as she sets them on the couch. It looks as if they had garnered quite the collection of dirt and grime from her walk from the buffet to her and Alexey’s suite.

“I-What?” You stutter at the sight of Ophelia’s large footpads suddenly invading your personal space. They were bigger than your whole body, and weren't exactly the most welcoming sight.

“What’s wrong, little human?” Ophelia teases with a knowing smirk. “Afraid of my wittle footsie wootsie?”

“I...I uh…” You try to come up with an answer that wouldn't dissatisfy your elephant master. “I’m sorry, it’s just that...they’re very, very big.”

“Of course they’re big to you, bug.” Ophelia gave you a smile that would make the Cheshire Cat a run for his money. “You’re an itty bitty human, and I’m a big bad elephant. My poor feet ache from walking all the time, having all this padding doesn't make it easy as well.” She gave you a cute pout before leaning her head back in a whine while putting a hand to her cheek. “If only someone would relive them of their suffering with their delicate little monkey hands…”

“...you didn’t have to say monkey, you know.” You cross your arms over your chest while giving her a stern look.

“Oops! Sorry, sometimes I get a little carried away my size.” She raised one left foot over her right, making it obvious that she was comparing your size to the length of her foot. She gives out a long, deep sigh and gives you a comforting smile. “Look, I know you’re new and this can all be a bit scary, but please, give me the benefit of the doubt. I already told you I can make it worth your while.”

That wasn’t untrue. She did promise to give you a ‘trunk job’ if you did well, but you wear the really looking forward to that. What you were looking forward to was the massive tip at the end of the day like Oscar gave you before. If that wasn’t motivation enough, the prospect of being punished for not doing your job well was. Ophelia lifted one of her feet on top of each other again, gently gnawing at her lips in anticipation as she eats them in front of you. “I’m waitiiiing~”.

The gentle swaying of her feet managed to catch and keep your attention. Ophelia giggled at the sight of your eyes helplessly following her feet, smugly smiling at you embarrassment

D... Damn it! What is wrong with me? You thought worryingly, as the gentle swaying of her paw somehow managed to catch, and keep your attention. Lucy giggled at the sight of your eyes helplessly following her paw around, until she suddenly lowered it back down. Now the two of you were staring at one another, with the Lucario smirking smugly at your apparent embarrassment. “S-sorry, I’ll...I’m just going to get this over with…”

Seeing no point in trying to delay the inevitable, you slowly approach Ophelia’s foot, and sat yourself down by it. With a genuinely happy smile, she carefully placed it onto your lap, massaging your crotch, taking effort into not hurting you in the process. You groan, but appreciate that she took her time. Even though her walk was short, the elephant managed to sweat profusely and collect a ton of grime on her soles. The powerful scent flooded your nostrils and made you grimace hard.

“Uhm...O-Ophelia?” You questioned the monumental pachyderm. “Do you mind if I clean your feet first before I start rubbing them?”

For a moment, Ophelia just stared down at you, thoroughly taking the question into consideration, before giving you another wide smile. “Of course, my wittle human! You can do whatever you with them, as long as they get their massage! Although, if you want something to clean 'em with... You've got a perfect little washcloth hidden right in your mouth, see?" She stick out her tongue at you with a grin, pointing to it for emphasis while forcibly grinds her foot into your torso in a taunt.

“That isn’t...that is not what I-n-NO!” You scowl as your face flushes cherry red at the mere idea of such a suggestion. “Not for an Octillion dollars would I do that!”

“Hehe, don’t go and blame me for this, human!” Ophelia scolds you with a laugh. “All I asked for was a foodruh, but you’re the one that wanted to do even more! Now quit stalling for time and start working those little hands.” She grinds her foot even firmer this time, threatening to knock you down if you give another excuse.
14213213212131332211231122.title: She wants a foot massage

choices: She sucks your manhood up her trunk
She wraps her trunk around your member, pumping it
She uses her trunk to get you off some other way
142132132121313322112311222.content:
With a resigned sigh you took hold of the imposing sole before you. It's surface felt tough and rigid, a thick leathery hide, calloused from supporting Ophelia's immense weight. Smeared onto this rugged sole was a thin film of sweat and grime. It left a distinct wet feeling on your hands the moment you grabbed her sole. You knew your hands were going to smell like this for the rest of the day, if not longer. Fearfully you lean in, touching the very tip of your tongue against the smelly surface. Immediately you recoil at the revolting taste. You try to hide your sounds of disgust, but Ophelia's big ears didn't miss them.

"Oh come now, it can't be that bad." She huffed. Her patience began to run thin. "And I'm still not feeling any rubbing. Don't make me ask you again." She pushed her foot forward, sliding you across the soft couch. When she stopped you realized there was at most a foot of space left between you and the couch's back cushion. If you didn't get a move on, she was going to mash you into the couch with her big stompers.

"I'll get my foot rub, one way or another." She said threateningly. Fearful that she might break you if she tried to grind you into the couch you shake of the nervous jitters and place your hands on her soles. You push and massage the leathery hide, but it didn't seem to have much of an effect. Fortunately, Ophelia seemed to find it funny, snorting with laughter before encouraging you.

"Come on, you don't have to go easy on me, puny. Put your back into it." Annoyed by her degrading words, you ball up your fists and punch her sole. That'll show her not to mess with you. She wasn't the only one who could get vicious. Unfortunately your vindictive streak was somewhat diminished by her. "That's the stuff, keep doing that." You were punching her and she wrote it off as a nice little foot rub? You felt humiliated. But thankfully the situation provided you with a big target to vent your frustrations on. Punch after punch fell onto the thick leathery hide. It reminded you a little of the punching bag in the garage of your parents' house.

Behind those thick soles Ophelia murred with relief. It took some time, but her human finally got into the swing of things. This foot rub wasn't half bad either. Maybe there was hope for this newbie yet. She feared for a while she'd have to crush this one and find a more capable human. But this was just an easy task. How would he fare with her more... unusual demands? She lifted her feet for a moment and switched them around, letting her other foot rest on his lap. He quickly understood his mission and began massaging it. With a cheeky smirk the elephant rested her feet just a little heavy on his package. She could feel it heat up. Very interesting.

You threw blow after blow at the sweaty sole before you. Your arms were beginning to tire and your knuckles were hurting from the dull impacts. The thick skin was unyielding, but judging by the elephant's subtle cries of relief you were doing the right thing. You tried your hardest to ignore the little squish your fists made, coating them with stench and grime whenever they hit her soles. Her feet rested uncomfortably heavy on your legs and groin, but you didn't have time to worry about that. If you slowed down, you feared she would push you into the back of the couch and finish the massage herself in a far more painful way. Finally the hefty feet left your lap and Ophelia took a good look at your haggard face. You were tired from throwing so many punches.

"Awww, is the itty bitty human all worn out? I was gonna ask you to massage the rest of my body too..." She laughed loudly at your incredulous stare. "Just kidding, puny. Catch your breath for a minute."

Between deep breaths you saw the elephant pondering. Was she thinking about what torment to subject you to next? Boldly you interrupt her thoughts with a question. "You got a towel for me to dry my hands?"

Ophelia looked down at her human with a mildly annoyed grimace before suddenly breaking into a smile. You gulp. She just thought up something, and it wasn't going to be nice. She reached down and picked you up once again. In spite of her delicate grip it was still unsettling how easily she lifted you off your feet. You were lifted close to her head and she ordered you to hold out your hands. Afraid of her squeezing you again you obeyed, stretching out both your arms. She reacted by opening her maw and bringing you even closer. Nasty elephant breath filled the air as she threatened to put you in her mouth. You begin to wiggle in her grasp, only widening her smile. Suddenly she closes her maw, trapping only your hands behind her lips. You cringe as her thick, slimy tongue coils around your hands, slathering them in goopy saliva. She spends five minutes slobbering all over your hands and licking every last square inch of them. Her agile tongue even slides between your fingers, leaving no surface untouched. When she finally pulls you away a thick strand of saliva bridges the gap between her maw and you for an uncomfortably long time. She sets you down, leaving you to look at your hands and the thick slime dripping off of them.

"That's as close to 'clean' as you're getting from me." She stated imperiously. "If there's any other part of you that you'd like me to clean, just let me know. Just be warned that I might just take the easy route and wash your whole body at once next time." She gave you an unsubtle wink. You still couldn't believe she just slobbered all over your hands for five minutes. But it seems stench was going to be part of you one way or another. Be it her grimy feet or now her pungent saliva. At least she didn't try to eat you for being such a pest as you initially feared when she brought you to her maw.

info.description:
You play the role of a guy too young to be hanging out at a casino, hanging out at a casino. You were usually a rebellious guy, so, when a new casino popped up in town and had an age limit, you decided to ignore the rules. You ran in, and suddenly came to realize you couldn't find the way out. On top of that, the casino is full of strangely amorous ladies, and... strange animal people. And the leader of the whole casino is a Bunny Lady named Bunnie. She's been running a traveling casino to attract gullible prey to her realm. From there, her patrons would do whatever they want to them, from eating them to having some... private time with them. Will you be able to escape the clutches of the Bunnie Casino? Or are you going to be a permanent resident?

Points of interest
*Betting Tables - What would a casino be without its betting tables. Here, one plays slots, blackjack, poker, craps, so on and so forth. When the money runs out, people tend to bet their clothes, most being rendered mostly naked by the end.
*Performance Hall - Close to the betting tables is the performance hall. Here, scantily-clad ladies either show off their pretty assets, show of magical tricks, and sometimes work in some audience participation. Be mindful of the changing rooms.
*Bar - Another staple of casinos. You should be careful here, for a few sips are guaranteed to cloud your judgement. They also tend to make drinkers stink worse.
*Hotel - Where the patrons stay. When you enter Bunnie's Casino, you're usually forced into a room, because you can't leave otherwise. And if you're some exploitable human, then you'll usually be forced into an occupied hotel room.

More points of interests will be added as time goes on.
